title: INtravel
description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtravel, skipping any feeds with errors.

items.title: Delta Air Lines slams AI pricing 'misinformation,' says it's not using customer data
items.description: Delta Air Lines fired back at lawmakers this week, disputing claims about its use of artificial intelligence in pricing fares.

items.title: New European border control system for non-EU travelers to launch this October
items.description: The EES will use biometric data to register the visits of non-European Union travelers.
